laws.suggestion: Remove the non-compete clause entirely as it is subject to strict requirements under Georgia law, specifically O.C.G.A. ยง 13-8-53. Use only confidentiality and trade secret protection clauses instead, such as: "Employee agrees not to disclose confidential information, including trade secrets, during or after employment with the Company.

Effective date: June 30, 2024
Employers affected: All employers i
laws.suggestion: Remove salary history questions. Replace with: 'Please provide your salary expectations for this role' to comply with Georgia law, which restricts inquiries into an applicant's salary history. This alternative language focuses on the applicant's expectations rather than their past salary.

review_notes.next_steps: Verify statute citations and effective dates
